title: Jeb：在MCPE创建世界菜单的一些小改动
author: kaho
txt_content:
@jeb_
With collaborative feature creeping, @_tomcc and I added the mob spawner blocks to the MC:PE creative menu. Change mob type with the eggs.
与未来的爬行协同[1]， @_tomcc 我在MCPE的创建【世界】菜单里加了一些怪物生成方块。用怪物蛋更改怪物的类型。




备注
[1] 求指导...

replies.author: hwr
replies.txt_content: 前排围观kaho掉渣天  玩0.9卡爆了。。。=w=

replies.author: 孙煜凯
replies.txt_content: 看到官网大家都在发bug所以就还没升级。。
With collaborative feature creeping与协作功能的？
